ygData.subject: Re: Anyone Know
ygData.msgSnippet: I have it.. and have never found a use for it.. nor can I imagine a use for it... but I m sure there must be SOME use for it. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ...
ygData.messageBody:
I have it.. and have never found a use for it.. nor can I imagine a use for
it... but I'm sure there must be SOME use for it.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Rick & Margi Ulrich <ulrich1@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, April 18, 1999 1:30 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Anyone Know


>From: "Rick & Margi Ulrich" <ulrich1@...>
>
>oh ok I get it, then I could just start walking in that direction to find
>it....Hummmmmmmmm anyone have it?
>If so is it usefull?
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Chris Trubiani [mailto:u1607755@...]
>> Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 9:52 AM
>> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Anyone Know
>>
>>
>> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>>
>> Sense summoned turns your body so that it is pointing towards the nearest
>> summoned creature.
>>
>> Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>>
>>
